#summary Installation.

= Introduction =

Installation must be done to the main AmiBroker folder.

If formulas folder is different then AmiBroker folder the next path must be changed:
{{{
  [PATH]
  TZpath=,C:\Program Files (x86)\AmiBrokerBeta\,
  ABpath=,C:\Program Files (x86)\AmiBrokerBeta\,
}}}

where
_TZpath_ is a 1st part of path to TimeZones files folder
_ABpath_ is a 1st part of path to SkyQuant formulas
